init 190522
ud 190522


### Parts of a business
These will depend on the type of business or company, size of the company, and the particulars of how the company is structured, etc. In no particular order.

* C-Suite
* Marketing
* Sales
* Finance
* Legal (procurement)
* HR
* Manufacturing
* R&D
* Admin
* Media
* Operations
* IT
* Suppliers
* Distribution
* Investors
